Reviews.Title: Night Switching Malfunction
Reviews.Author: Steve S
Reviews.Content: This camera (bought at Fry's in Burbank) stopped switching to night vision in less than 6 months; it will be sent in under warranty. My first Lorex camera, probably my last. My cheap Clover camera worked 5 years without a major problem.

ProductInfo.Features:
Advanced high-resolution image sensor - Produces sharp and clear video with 450 TV lines
30 IR LEDs provides class leading might vision range of up to 50ft
True day/night operation using built-in IR filter changeable mechanism to achieve accurate color representation in varying lighting conditions
Advanced day/night mode - Picture automatically switches to B&W; delivering better clarity in low light conditions
Weatherproof design - Ideal for outdoor and indoor applications (IP66*)
ProductInfo.Name: Lorex Corp CVC6994CL High Resolution Color Indoor Outdoor Security Camera
